title: Ticket #389: On Win32 the startd loadavg thread consistently dies
description:
The thread in the startd on Win32 that computes the load average dies all the time on my laptop. I am running Win XP Professional SP2, with winupdate running (i.e. all patches except SP3).

It is easy to reproduce - every single time i do condor_status -direct to my startd, the StartLog reports the following: 

    4/16 10:49:13 loadavg thread died, restarting. (exit code=2)
remarks:
Does the \System\Processor Queue Length performance counter register any data in the Performance Monitor.

2009-Apr-17 16:11:52 by tannenba:
The Performance Object "System" doesn't exist for me in perfmon!!!! Hmmm, will change this ticket from Code Defect to Incident.
